IndianRed.description: A dark, reddish shade resembling the color of traditional Indian clay.

LightCoral.description: A pale, warm pinkish shade similar to the color of coral reefs.

Salmon.description: A vibrant, orange-pink shade reminiscent of the flesh color of salmon fish.

DarkSalmon.description: A deep, muted pinkish-orange shade resembling the color of cooked salmon.

LightSalmon.description: A light, peachy-orange shade evoking the color of lightly cooked salmon.
